MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Walthall Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.49PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.23PM on 3rd of November 2020.
